data.title: Bethel Leaders Network
data.meta_description: Join a Bethel community of leaders seeking after Jesus Christ. Easy to use, online membership with access to courses, training, mentorships, and community.
data.text:
Our Heart and Vision

We are a unique expression of our family, Bethel Church, yet our vision is the same — to see the global expansion of God's Kingdom through His manifest presence. We express this mission by creating a place of belonging in our community for leaders around the world. BLN is not about building a big organization or a denomination, but about building big people. We empower global mothers and fathers to raise up the next generation and provide a place for emerging leaders to be transformed and equipped. It is our dream that our BLN family will cause reformation in the church, release freedom into the spheres of society, and create apostolic places and spaces that will empower every believer in their uniqueness and divine calling to bring Heaven to earth. Together, we seek to take the Kingdom further than we ever thought possible.

Learn More ▸

Are you the senior leader of a church or ministry?

Ignite Revival in Your Region

The influence membership is for senior leaders of churches and ministry organizations. If you would like to join please submit your application. We can't wait to connect with you!

Are you the senior leader of a church or ministry?

Ignite Revival in Your Region

The influence membership is for senior leaders of churches and ministry organizations. If you would like to join please submit your application. We can't wait to connect with you!

Dave & Taff Harvey

Co-Directors of Bethel Leaders Network

Dave & Taff Harvey are the Co-Directors of Bethel Leaders Network. They moved from Australia to Redding CA in 2009 to pursue the Kingdom of Heaven in a greater way. Dave is a gifted motivational speaker who has a powerful prophetic voice and international influence. His passion is the empowerment of individuals, leaders and communities, in all spheres of society, helping them to live naturally supernatural lives. Dave also has a passion for sharing testimonies, and out of this passion he has founded and currently oversees the INCREASE Productions.

Taff is passionate about worship, family, and leadership. Taff has pursued the heart of heaven in worship ever since she was a child. She currently serves as the Worship Team Pastor for the Bethel Healing Rooms. She has a passion to see people gain freedom in body, mind and spirit, through encounters with the Holy Spirit and the presence of God. Taff’s heart is to help others realize their true identity as sons and daughters in the Kingdom of Heaven.

Leading together, Dave & Taff compliment each other and pull out each other's strengths. They are passionate about creating healthy supernatural families. They have three blonde boys Zeke, Jaden and Chase.

Steve & Wendy Backlund

Senior Associate Directors

Steve and Wendy Backlund were senior pastors for 17 years before joining the team at Bethel Church in Redding, California in 2008. One of their pastoral assignments was Mountain Chapel in Weaverville, California, where Bill Johnson pastored before coming to Bethel. Steve is a leader, developer, joy activist, revivalist teacher, and a key part of the BLN leadership team. Wendy compliments Steve greatly in these things and has a ministry teaching people to live from the spiritual dimension of their lives. They travel extensively throughout the world encouraging churches and leaders. Together, they’ve authored more than a dozen books.
